text: Euspondylus auyanensis is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Venezuela. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 2009 Category:Taxa named by Charles W. Myers Category:Taxa named by Gilson Rivas Category:Taxa named by Robert C. Jadin
title: Euspondylus auyanensis
